refnamediv.refpurpose: Flush the output buffer, return it as a string and turn off output buffering

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ob_get_flush flushs the output buffer, return it as a string and turns off output buffering. ob_get_flush returns &false; if no buffering is active.

note.simpara: This function is similar to ob_end_flush, except that this function returns the buffer as a string.

example.title: ob_get_flush example
example.programlisting:
<?php
//using output_buffering=On
print_r(ob_list_handlers());

//this will output everything in buffer
echo ob_get_flush();

print_r(ob_list_handlers());
?>
